name: Edwin Colón Zayas
description: '''Edwin Colón Zayas''' (October 27, 1965), is a [[Cuatro (instrument)|Puerto Rican cuatro]] player from [[Puerto Rico]].  He joins a large number of Puerto Rican artists,  "innovative tradition-bearing," who focus their talents in extolling the virtues of the Puerto Rican creole and [[Jíbaro (Puerto Rico)|Jíbaro]] way of life.
